attributes.action: Bring back all British soldiers stationed in Germany home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
World War II is over, the occupation period is over, it is purposeless to station any soldiers in Germany. Besides, Britain is a better training base.
I understand that someone needs to defend Germany but that should be the Germans. If they want to be secure, they need to spend more on the Bundeswehr, not ask someone else to fight for them.
